trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKYR106_04175_OFPILONA_000_000<tab>Oho! You must be <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Mistress Rowena's told me all about you. Says you're quite the renowned <var 28 ((ClassJob)) E94501 /var>!

TEXT_AKTKYR106_04175_OFPILONA_000_001<tab>The name's Ofpilona, by the way. The mistress's charged me with managing her Radz<var 1F /var>at<var 1F /var>Han branch. Lookin' forward to doin' business with you!

TEXT_AKTKYR106_04175_OFPILONA_000_002<tab>...Which isn't to say I've got anythin' special to ask of you. All I mean is that your business is just as welcome here as it is at any other House of Splendors.
TEXT_AKTKYR106_04175_OFPILONA_000_003<tab>O' course, I'd certainly prefer you do more of your business here than anywhere else. Esteemed clients like yourself'll attract even more customers, y'see.

TEXT_AKTKYR106_04175_OFPILONA_000_004<tab>And if we keep drawin' in business at a good clip, before long we'll have to rebrand as Ofpilona's House of Splendors... That old witch won't know what hit 'er...
TEXT_AKTKYR106_04175_OFPILONA_000_005<tab>...Er, don't you worry about that last part. Just peruse our wares and buy somethin' if it strikes your fancy!
TEXT_AKTKYR106_04175_OFPILONA_000_010<tab><sigh> What I wouldn't give to find an expert artisan...
TEXT_AKTKYR106_04175_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 80 or above.
